name: Discretionary Supplement
title: "Discretionary Supplement" Dori
desc: "First raise the price by 30%, then sell at a 20% discount!"
inPlayDescription: The <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy gained by characters with no <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy by 1 when <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy is gained.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Dori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Dori, equip this card.After Dori equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Alcazarzaray's Exactitude once.The <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy gained by characters with no <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy by 1 when <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy is gained.(You must have Dori in your deck to add this card to your deck)
